ebay.title: eBay’s Offers to Buyers Feature Hits $1B GMV
ebay.abstract: Offers to Buyers reaches new milestone this month.
ebay.author: By: Harry Temkin and Parin Jogani

ebay.title: Introducing QR Codes for eBay Shipping Labels
ebay.abstract: With our new QR codes feature, sellers will no longer need a printer to use eBay shipping labels.
ebay.author: By: Manuela Misani and Stephan Kraus

ebay.title: Expanding the eBay Stores Experience to Our Mobile App
ebay.abstract: The eBay Stores experience is now available on our mobile app for Android and iOS.
ebay.author: By: Minh Tran-Lee

ebay.title: An Introduction to Apache Flink
ebay.abstract: How we’re using Apache Flink to handle big data streaming in real-time.
ebay.author: By: Chenru Lyu

ebay.title: eBay’s Technology Transformation is Made for Evolving Customer Needs
ebay.abstract: How our advances in edge computing are empowering both buyers and sellers in times of great demand with ease and agility.
ebay.author: By: Mazen Rawashdeh

ebay.title: Introducing eBay’s New Time Away Feature to Help Sellers Manage Selling on eBay While on a Break
ebay.abstract: Time Away is now available to all Sellers and automatically updates the shipping date to make the experience more seamless.
ebay.author: By: Vikram Shandilya

ebay.title: eBay Partners with Google Assistant to Bring Voice Control to eBay’s Android App
ebay.abstract: A new partnership launches voice control capabilities on our marketplace to meet the needs of our customers by creating a more seamless, modern experience.
ebay.author: By: Evan Thomas

ebay.title: An Automatic Mirror Testing Solution for Messaging Systems in eBay
ebay.abstract: A look at how we developed a solution for automatic mirror testing to overcome the challenges of migrating eBay’s proprietary messaging applications to a more modern technical stack.
ebay.author: By: Tao Jin and Vivek Gadiyar

ebay.title: Our Online Analytical Processing Journey with ClickHouse on Kubernetes
ebay.abstract: Learn about the latest evolution of online analytical processing (OLAP) data, now with ClickHouse on Kubernetes.
ebay.author: By: Sudeep Kumar, Mohan Garadi, Xiancheng Li, Amber Vaidya and Liangfei Su

ebay.title: Software Quality: Elevating the Game
ebay.abstract: Learn how software product quality goes well beyond simply avoiding bugs.
ebay.author: By: Lakshimi Duraivenkatesh

ebay.title: eBay Helps Buyers More Easily Discover Competitively Priced Items
ebay.abstract: eBay recently launched a new feature that helps buyers find things easily on the Search page by highlighting competitively priced items from trusted sellers.
ebay.author: By: Prerna Dubey and Manoj  Kannadasan

ebay.title: eBay Motors: Accelerating With Flutter™
ebay.abstract: The UI software development kit enables a consistent user experience across iOS and Android.
ebay.author: By: Corey Sprague and Larry McKenzie

ebay.title: eBay Virtual Tracking Number Now Live in the UK and Australia
ebay.abstract: eBay’s unique code flows through Royal Mail and Australia Post networks, automating provision of eligible tracking and event data for buyers and sellers.
ebay.author: By: Brian Pao, Shuja  Rahman and Irene Keay

ebay.title: Building a Product Catalog: eBay's 2nd Annual University Machine Learning Competition
ebay.abstract: Participating universities will structure listing data to help solve a real-world ecommerce challenge.
ebay.author: By: Senthil Padmanabhan

ebay.title: An eBay Charity Perspective for Developers
ebay.abstract: This article explores charity support in Public APIs and hypothetical integration scenario walkthroughs for developers who wish to integrate with eBay for Charity in their eBay-powered experiences.
ebay.author: By: Shekhar Banerjee and Diana Dukart

ebay.title: The Journey to Integrating Android App Bundles
ebay.abstract: Over the last few years, our Native Mobile Architecture team has been reshaping our native app experience to better align with evolving mobile standards.
ebay.author: By: Christopher Bowling

ebay.title: Terapeak Research 2.0 - Making the Data Processing Pipeline Robust
ebay.abstract: How the data processing pipeline functions in Terapeak and what factors make it fault tolerant, robust and highly available.
ebay.author: By: Kashif Usmani, Yury Elizarov and Khachatur  Kocharyan

ebay.title: Kubernetes Secrets: A Secure Credential Store for Jenkins
ebay.abstract: At eBay, we containerized Jenkins to provide a continuous build infrastructure on Kubernetes Clusters to power the ecommerce marketplace experience. Our goal was to leverage the capability of Kubernetes secrets, for managing the Jenkins credentials.
ebay.author: By: Vasumathy  Seenuvasan and Ravi Bukka

ebay.title: eBay’s Image Clean-Up Feature Brings the Power of Image Processing Algorithms to Android
ebay.abstract: This feature enables our sellers to create cleaner listings.
ebay.author: By: Dzmitry  Lebedzeu

ebay.title: eBay Makes Promoted Listings in Search Results More Relevant and Dynamic
ebay.abstract: The Promoted Listing algorithm continues to build revenue for the marketplace and makes sellers happy.
ebay.author: By: Shreya Raval, Yi Liu and Gajanan  Adalinge

ebay.title: Celebrating 20 Years: eBay’s New APIs Enable Developers to Create Modern Buying and Selling Experiences
ebay.abstract: eBay launches APIs for Managed Payments, Seller Initiated Offers, Charity and more for developers to help their businesses thrive.
ebay.author: By: Tanya Vlahovic

ebay.title: How We Used Our Buy APIs, Catch Platform to Build a New Portal for the NHS
ebay.abstract: In partnership with the U.K. National Health Services, we leveraged our Buy APIs and Catch platform to build a new portal to deliver personal protective equipment to frontline health care workers.
ebay.author: By: Tanya Vlahovic

ebay.title: eBay Launches Secure Local Pickup To Simplify The Shipping Experience
ebay.abstract: The enhanced feature enables buyers to purchase items online and pick up directly from sellers in their vicinity.
ebay.author: By: Shuja  Rahman

ebay.title: eBay Makes Search More Efficient Through Personalization
ebay.abstract: eBay introduces Best Match to personalize buyers’ search feeds.
ebay.author: By: Shreya Raval

ebay.title: Dark Mode Now Live on eBay Native Apps
ebay.abstract: eBay becomes one of the first ecommerce companies to launch Dark Mode on iOS and Dark Theme on Android.
ebay.author: By: Bradford Shellhammer

ebay.title: Streamlining Language Technology from Idea to Deployment
ebay.abstract: In recent eBay Tech Blog articles, we presented the Unified AI platform called Krylov and our pythonic tool to interact with the platform, PyKrylov. In this article, we introduce our Natural Language Processing framework built on top of the AI platform.
ebay.author: By: Daniel Stein, Gregor Leusch, Praseeda Sathaye and Selcuk Kopru

ebay.title: eBay Integrates Video into the eBay Motors App
ebay.abstract: The eBay Video Platform will allow sellers to add in videos of the cars they are selling on the eBay Motors App.
ebay.author: By: Geetanjali Gupta and Gilbert Bouzeid

ebay.title: Building a Product Catalog: What we Learned from our University Machine Learning Competition
ebay.abstract: We challenged more than 100 college students at seven universities to structure listing data using AI and machine learning.
ebay.author: By: Senthil Padmanabhan

ebay.title: Relation Embedding with Dihedral Group in Knowledge Graph
ebay.abstract: eBay researchers recently published a paper about a method for KG relation embedding using dihedral group. Experimental results on benchmark KGs show that the model outperforms existing bilinear form models and even deep learning methods.
ebay.author: By: Canran Xu and Ruijiang Li
